text: South Talpatti Island is a small uninhabited island in the Bay of Bengal. Indian government call it New Moore Island, but local fishermen of Bangladesh call it Bhashani Dwip. This is a disputed island between Bangladesh and India. The island did not exist before 1970. It emerged after the Bhola cyclone hit the area in 1970. Category:Islands of India Category:Uninhabited islands
title: South Talpatti Island
